[bq="uc9"]Yo carcas; quick question: is sword art online season 2 any better?  Also is the trap character still a trap in season 2?[/bq]
I can answer that.

In my opinion it is. 

The primus of it is a WHOLE lot cooler.

And the shit that's going on is pretty interesting. Its like a Mystery action kind of thing.

sadly right now I _believe_ there on filler and the filler isn't good. So I'm waiting for them to get back on track.

topics.body:
I think something's wrong with me.

How is it I can shrug off most of the smut that goes on in Panty and Stocking, and can somehow not get too depressed watching Attack on Titan, but whenever the boys are at the baths, I get nervous?

And why do I keep thinking that En and Atsushi are secretly gay for each other? Or heck, maybe they're all gay for each other! (That would be quite a twist) 
But the biggest offender is definitely Yumoto and his fondness for the Wombat.
_If he doesn't want to cuddle with you, do not cuddle him, you ditzy creep._

Or am I just taking this too seriously, to quote a fiery joker?
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000
